name: Paul Guillermo Arias
tagline: Sharing my adventures in High Performance Computing (HPC) since 2014
body:
### Welcome to my HPC blog
Greetings, and thank you for visiting my blog on my "adventures" in High Performance Computing. The purpose of this page is to share with you tools (read: code!) that I use in some of my research.  I will endeavor to provide a description that gives deep understanding of what the code does so that it might benefit you in your own projects.

Stay tuned for more entries! Happy coding!

-Paul
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
